EmailTemplate.description: Email Template used for sending Neo4J Bloom Desktop App License Key To Customer
EmailTemplate.name: Neo4J Send Neo4J Bloom Desktop App License Key To Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Activation key for {!License_Key__c.Feature__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!License_Key__c.Registrant_First_Name__c},
Thank you for choosing the Neo4j graph database platform!
Your activation key for {!License_Key__c.Feature__c} is attached to this email. This key is set to expire on {!License_Key__c.X_Expiration_Date_Formatted__c}.
If installing for the first time, please download the latest Neo4j Desktop from https://neo4j.com/download and activate the Neo4j Bloom app using this key. Please refer to the Bloom documentation at https://neo4j.com/docs/#bloom for detailed instructions.
If you have any questions, please reach out to {!License_Key__c.Sales_Rep_Name__c} at {!License_Key__c.Sales_Rep_Email__c}.
Cheers, {!User.FirstName}
